tool_description: “Find By PostCode” API get addresses for the given UK PostCode. This API provides a JSON interface to search UK addresses for a postcode.his API uses the latest PAF and Multiple Residence data from Royal Mail.
title: Find By PostCode

api_list.name: Find By PostCode
api_list.description: “Find By PostCode” API get addresses for the given UK PostCode. This API provides a JSON interface to search UK addresses for a postcode.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://find-by-postcode.p.rapidapi.com/v1/postcodes/{postcode}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "find-by-postcode.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
